import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react' import noteContext from "../context/noteContext" const AddNote = (props) => { const context = useContext(noteContext); const {addNote} = context; const[note, setNote] = useState({title:"", description:"", tag:""}) const handleclick = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); addNote(note.title, note.description, note.tag); setNote({title:"", description:"", tag:""}); props.showAlert("Updated Successfully", "success") } const onChange = (e)=>{ setNote({...note, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return (

Add a Note

) } export default AddNote
